style_guide.visual_style: ultra realistic, professional e-commerce catalog photography
style_guide.lighting: soft studio key light, subtle rim light, natural contact shadow
style_guide.quality: 4K, sharp focus, high detail, clean edges
style_guide.negative_prompt: blurry, low-res, watermark, logo, text, label artifacts, extra objects, duplicate objects, cluttered background, noise, overexposed highlights, deformed packaging
